::Feline::

She smiled and watched K-9 walk out of the lab.  She sighed and 
looked at HotRod. "Well, it's just you and me for a while." She 
smiled and continued to work on his injuries.  

It took her a few hours, but she finally had HotRod fully repaired.  
She looked at him and smiled at her handy work.  She was really 
impressed with herself.  She smiled,"OK, your done now.  If you want, 
you can get back into the CR for an energy recharge.  Or go and join 
K-9 in the mess hall."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::K9::
> 
> "Ok, I'll check back later." He walked out, and to the Mess Hall, 
where
> he sat with some Energin, and started getting drunk.
